participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, with a sense of wonder about his abilities.
participant_1.background: i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body. i can move objects with my mind.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Determined and ambitious, she has a strong sense of justice and a love for horses.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.
